Prompt: Please provide the dataset path for processing
Description: Collects dataset information for batch processing
Initiates batch job and generates batch ID

Prompt: Batch job {batch_id} submitted for external processing
Description: Suspends while external batch processor works

Prompt: Waiting for API response for request {request_id}
Description: Suspends execution waiting for async API response
Suspends while analysis runs (could take hours/days)
